caption: So nice here in Newtown park, our second time, our kids lots of fun, and we met Anny she so kind and she assist us well, thank you.

A fun place where young and old children will find what they want. A caf√© area is dedicated to parents. Between climbing walls, indoor games area of ‚Äã‚Äãall kinds, bowling or even arcade and table football, all children can let off steam to their heart's content. In addition, you can reserve a slot to celebrate your child's birthday, and the staff takes great care of you. To let off steam for your children for a few hours, this is the ideal place!!
super good welcome the employees are very kind and attentive to the customer space for children clean safe for babies top

I came today at 4:30 p.m. with the aim of spending the end of the day and having a snack with my daughters in the park. I was surprised to see that the latter didn't offer anything for snacks even though I'm used to going to other brands such as Royal Kids which offer a lot of choice. I notice that 90% of the customers sitting at the tables next to me have brought cakes, drinks and chips with them. I then decided to go to another store in the city to buy a snack for my daughters despite the fact that the person at reception showed me that food would be prohibited... on my return I was taken aback. side by the security guard. I then explain to him that the majority of customers eat cakes from outside so I don't see why it would be prohibited for me and not for others. The supervisor arrives with an aggressive statement "for you it's no, the others I haven't seen them I don't care". So I explain that my daughter being diabetic she needs to eat and that therefore she will just go to the entrance to have her cake then return and that her answer I got: it's almost 6 p.m. that's not the time. snack time and if they cross the barrier they won't come back. I am literally shocked by this lack of heart in the situation. At no time did they apologize for not offering anything or offer me a solution. So the park is very beautiful but the staff needs to be completely overhauled... I had come with the aim of consuming (I had even planned the cash for the tokens) I am leaving with disgust and I will not return no more feet...

To begin with, a structure is closed on a Wednesday during the holiday period, it's nonsense, all the children are in the same place. For the choice of food there is a twix, a kinder bueno and I don't know what but the worst is that I asked for a twix and they gave it to me I looked at the expiry date it was 3 weeks past its m I was shocked if I would have given this to my son without looking he could have been very sick!!! I advise against

On the occasion of my daughter's birthday. The children are delighted. Thank you for the welcome and support! (A üíì for the young brunette girl at the cafe and the young man with the braids who made the day unforgettable for the kids and their mom!) Too bad there are no toilets!
Plan a budget of at least ‚Ç¨30 per child so that they can have fun - Nice but a little expensive

This kind of arcade is a cash machine, we know that before coming. But make card payments easier if you really want to get the most out of us. At least we don't find ourselves paying 12 euros for the formula, then 2 euros per adult and ending up understanding that the tokens are only in cash...I come on the day when the distributors are out of service. And obviously I'm not going to take it out on the employees who have nothing to do with it...

12 euros for entry and 2 euros for the accompanying person, plus very very dirty (dust, chewing gum, chips, balloon) for a Tuesday it's not serious! Cleaning hasn't been done for months due to the dust found there. Loud music and not suitable for children. I don't recommend at all

Apparently the rules are not the same for everyone in this space. Several tables filled with food from outside but when it's me who brings it it doesn't fit.... it's up to the customer at their place. I advise you against it. I, who wanted to test a new park to keep the address for the winter, am going to return to my habits where at least the staff is friendly and smiling

I have just discovered the place and it is a great shame that I saw it through hazzar, a family corner with a good welcome, we can rest after shopping and let the children relax (under our eyes of course) Don't hesitate to take a look, you won't be disappointed!!

Great discovery üëåüèº I brought my children aged 4 and 9 who really enjoyed it! Virtual reality + game structure Gaming machines with tokens (cash payment) are available to vary the pleasures. Thank you for the welcome from Rachel, very professional, smiling and invested üëçüèº

I've been once but not twice, so where to start... Already, no explanation of the rules to the children. My son went rock climbing and after 2 minutes he burned his hands on the rope. I went to the manager to explain the situation. He accused the trainee of not having given the instructions, even though she herself did not know them. We had to find someone to blame... My son not only got injured, but was not able to fully enjoy the activity. The manager refused to reimburse me on the pretext that I had paid by credit card. He offered me a place in exchange, but my son categorically refused to return. I then asked him to give me tokens to take my daughter bowling.  The next day, I run errands and drop my kids off at the park before joining them later. To my great surprise, this same employee dared to reproach me for having let my children in without paying for tickets, when they had simply come in to use the tokens from the day before, he told me that just to enter and look I had to pay. And there, he told me that if I had insisted yesterday, he would have reimbursed me... To flee! Dishonest, thief and expensive for not much.

Yes, the space is large and new, however ‚Ç¨12 per child + payment for parents just to access the structures without tokens. We take the time to explain the price but not at all the activities. Given the price, the service needs to be reviewed, it is not up to par, I would not come back and I will not recommend. ‚ÄúHead in the clouds at aeroville is nicer and more profitable‚Äù

Bad experience, I brought 5 girls aged 10 to play the ARENA virtual reality games, there is no supervision, no explanation of the games, the supervisors have no training or experience with children, I even asked a site manager, no response!!!  , I advise you not to waste your money and your time.

You have to pay 12‚Ç¨ for the child plus 2‚Ç¨ for the accompanying person. The structure is small and all other games pay. And there are staff who offer free activities to their family members (tokens, bowling and even drinks). Nothing is explained. Personally I won't come back
12 euros entry to hope for an afternoon but without anything to eat, how can you contain the children?! It's been open for 1 year, it's a shame, we should think about it...

A great experience with Rachelle, a very smiling and helpful person. My daughter really liked the activities except that she was a little afraid of climbing but with Rachelle she liked it, well done and thank you to the team ü´∂ü´∂ü´∂ ‚Ä¶

When we opened we thought it would be a great place for ‚Äúhead in the clouds‚Äù type kids and actually not at all. Not only is it still very expensive But in addition, if you are accompanying a mother with children, you pay ‚Ç¨2 to watch kids who are not even yours while playing. It's a shame ! Fortunately, people like MIMI are patient and friendly and also friendly to calmly explain the rules that we found ridiculous. This place won't last long I hope because it's a shame to have so much space for nothing

Very disappointed today, I have already been to the place 3-4 times but today I am told that my 1 year old daughter must also pay for her entry (full price also i.e. 13‚Ç¨ no "baby" price) so who took a nap and not even taking advantage of the structure I find it scandalous to charge babies under 2 years old because it is not suitable for them and they also pay full price for the little they do or can do , In the end 26‚Ç¨ for 2 children I call it political theft to be seriously reconsidered we will come back
I went there today with my two children. They had a lot of fun. The place is clean, the staff very pleasant and friendly. to do again üòÅ ‚Ä¶

Very good for keeping the children occupied.  Mimi is very outgoing and kind to the little ones.  Too bad in terms of catering, it would be nicer to offer pancakes, waffles etc. for snacks.  We'll come back :)
Very good concept for all ages, the downside is the lack of staff at the different activities (bowling which had a lot of problems) Virtual reality where there is no one to help you...
Please review your hiring criteria for execrable staff with customers.  I didn't come here to suffer ;-) we may not agree but there are ways of speaking

If you want to have a good time with your family, I don't recommend this place. Entrance suddenly became chargeable for parents, although that had never been the case. The space is not clean and the staff are haughty. To flee!
Great welcome, the team on site is very attentive and professional, the games on site are very varied, I highly recommend. My two daughters were won over.

Above the behavior of the employees especially the one who thinks she is the director with her ponytail no safety for the children because children of 5 years and who says it is 6 years 7 years old ask for the CNI before a child gets bored Don't even know how to manage it and for temp I've been coming since the opening

Really Newton Park deserves even more than 5 stars it's a clean welcoming fun place, all the games are fun, when I say everything that's really everything. If you want to have a good time I recommend it.
A super nice, clean and friendly place. climbing accessible to adults and children, frankly not bad. a big thank you to Kevin and Antho for this morning ü§©ü§© ‚Ä¶

We came many times, and I found the (male) team rather lazy...but I was pleasantly surprised today by the young girls we met: Anny and Rachel are welcoming, friendly and smiling! And what's more professionals: Rachel took care to explain the safety instructions to the children and Anny came to make sure that the cable was not twisted. Newton Park would benefit from having more staff so involved. Thanks and see you next time.

Since opening, we have been taking our daughter so she can have fun. We are always well received there. It is a very friendly and attentive team of young people. My daughter loves the beach structure with the unlimited slide and the car circuit. Good atmosphere and the space for parents is very well arranged. Thanks to Georges, Kessy, Antony and the rest of the team.

Incredibly poor, a very very expensive money pump, extremely poorly explained at the entrance...12 euros per child for a tiny pack and 2 euros per token for the games, it's excessive, only cash is accepted...weird ones slot machine system. No one should definitely go there.
Really bad park Almost empty ball pit Slide that doesn't slip. Nothing for a 2 year old to do. 1 closed structure. To avoid
Thank you for the welcome to Anny and Roger, very friendly space, great for families, very clean space, my children had a great time, great value for money, we will come back
We had a great time as a family Smiling team Thanks to ROGER KEVIN and MIMI who listen to the children Package at 25‚Ç¨ at the top üëç ‚Ä¶
Finally in a wonderful place for children! My son went there yesterday, he loved his day üòç Lots of choice of activities, it's perfect. Welcoming and friendly staff. I keep the address
We were very well received by the Newton Park team, very clean space and smiling team, thanks to Anny and Roger who were super respectful, we will come backüòâ ‚Ä¶
Really great games room, the staff took great care to redo it, my children had a great time
